text: The Eshtaol Forest () is a forest in Israel, located north of Beit Shemesh and near Ta'oz and Neve Shalom. The Forest of the Martyrs lies to the east. The forest is a popular recreation area and is one of the largest forests in Israel. The forest (like most other forests in Israel) was planted in by the Jewish National Fund, which continues to expand it. The forest covers an area of . ==Related pages== *List of forests in Israel *Jerusalem Forest *Yatir Forest *Jewish National Fund ==Other websites== *Jewish National Fund website Category:Forests Category:Jerusalem District
title: Eshtaol Forest
